sentences.en: A windstorm in Washington is causing power outages throughout the region.
sentences.cn: 风暴造成整个华盛顿地区电力供应中断。

sentences.en: annual sales in the region of 30 million.
efforts to bring peace to the region
sentences.cn: 给这个地区带来和平的努力

sentences.en: House-hunting is in fact relatively painless in this region.
sentences.cn: 在这个地区找房子事实上相对比较容易。

sentences.en: Militia leaders had halted overland food convoys in the region.
sentences.cn: 民兵首领已拦阻了该地区经由陆上运送食品的车队。

sentences.en: Several other sub-species of gull are found in the region.
sentences.cn: 在该地区还发现了海鸥的其他亚种。

sentences.en: The map shows the rest of the western region, encompassing nine states.
sentences.cn: 地图上显示了西部地区的其他部分，包括9个州。

sentences.en: The power stations burn coal from the Ruhr region.
sentences.cn: 发电站烧的煤产自鲁尔地区。

sentences.en: The region began to use quinine successfully as a prophylactic.
sentences.cn: 该地区开始成功地用奎宁作为预防剂。

sentences.en: The region was split three ways, between Greece, Serbia and Bulgaria.
sentences.cn: 这一地区被希腊、塞尔维亚和保加利亚分成了3部分。

sentences.en: The region's hard-pressed consumers are spending less on luxuries.
sentences.cn: 该地区的消费者经济窘迫，在奢侈品上的开销比以前少了。

sentences.en: The report breaks down the results region by region.
sentences.cn: 报告将调查结果按地区分成若干部分。

sentences.en: The Rough Guide to Nepal is a comprehensive guide to the region.
sentences.cn: 《尼泊尔概况》是一本全面介绍该地区的旅游指南。

sentences.en: There is tension in the region following the killing of seven civilians.
sentences.cn: 随着7名平民被杀害，该地区局势紧张起来。

sentences.en: They wanted a pretext for subduing the region by force.
sentences.cn: 他们想找借口用武力征服这个地区。

sentences.en: This south-west region of France is the home of claret.
sentences.cn: 法国西南部的这个地区是干红葡萄酒的产地。

sentences.en: Unless these questions are solved, the region will remain a powder keg.
sentences.cn: 除非这些问题得到解决，否则该地区会一直是个火药桶。

words.tran_cn: 地区的；局部的；整个地区的
地方主义；地区性；地区特征；行政区域划分
地方主义作家；地方主义者

phrases.tran_cn: 干旱区域，干旱地区；干燥区
[化]可行域；[计]可行区域；[经]可行性区域

trans.tran_cn: 地区，行政区域，（首都以外的）各地区，身体部位
trans.tran_en: a large area of a country or of the world, usually without exact limits
